scripts.test: npm run test:before && export DEBUG='hojs:*,project-core:*,knex:*,super-cache:*' && export NODE_ENV=dev,test && cd dist && mocha
scripts.test:debug: npm run test:before && export DEBUG='hojs:*,project-core:*,knex:*,super-cache:*' && export NODE_ENV=dev,test && cd dist && mocha --debug-brk
scripts.test:before: npm run test:drop-tables && npm run test:create-tables
scripts.watch: npm run clean && babel src -d dist --watch --source-maps=inline
scripts.compile: npm run clean && babel src -d dist --source-maps=inline
scripts.dev: export DEBUG='hojs:*,project-core:*,knex:*' && export NODE_ENV=dev && cd dist && nodemon server.js
